casebody.data:
In the Matter of McCRORY STORES CORPORATION, and Subsidiary Corporations, Bankrupt. Henry Alan JOHNSTON et al., Appellants. No. 159. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 9, 1934. Peaslee & Brigham, of New York City (Henry Alan Johnston, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Sydney M. Kaye, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order reversed in open court.
